name: Sleeping Coffin (Special edition)
description:
Two people awake from this world.

A young man named Lucas that don't remember his pass

A mysterious being that is helping him choose his decisions.

Together these two will go on a incredible adventure and discover the world of sleeping coffin.   Why are you here and what is the reason for this existence.

Just like your life you can make any decisions you want but you are making Lucas decisions. Is there a deeper meeting to this world or is this just another life?

12 sleeping coffins.
